org.vertx.java.core.stdio

Class Stdio

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.vertx.java.core.stdio.Stdio

  • public class Stdio
extends java.lang.Object

    Provides asynchronous stream wrappers around STDOUT, STDIN and STDERR

    Author:
    Tim Fox
